sentences.en: It was apparent that the glaciation occurred in the relatively recent past because the drift was soft, like freshly deposited sediment.
sentences.cn: 很明显冰川作用就发生在相对不远的过去，因为漂流物很软，像新鲜的沉积物。

sentences.en: Sucre rushes to finish smoothing the surface of the freshly poured concrete.
sentences.cn: Sucre 急于快点完成工作，把新浇筑的混凝土表面抹平。

sentences.en: I leave behind two trees: one with silver grey hair, the other still freshly green.
sentences.cn: 我留下两棵树，一棵长着银灰色的头发，另一棵还鲜绿。
